title: Python for Everybody
description: Learn to Program and Analyze Data with Python. Develop programs to gather, clean, analyze, and visualize data.
lengthDescription: Get in-depth knowledge of a subject.
learningOutcome: Install Python and write your first program,
Describe the basics of the Python programming language,
Use variables to store, retrieve and calculate information.
Utilize core programming tools such as functions and loops.

title: Foundations of Project Management
description: Upgrade yourself with these fundamental skills to manage projects.
lengthDescription: Gain insight into a topic and learn the fundamentals.
learningOutcome: Describe project management skills, roles, and responsibilities across a variety of industries.
Define organizational structure and organizational culture and explain how it impacts project management.
Explain the project management life cycle and compare different program management methodologies.

title: Vital Signs: Understanding What the Body Is Telling Us
description: Explore the anatomy and physiology underlying the vital signs so that you will develop a systematic, integrated understanding of how the body functions.
lengthDescription: Gain insight into a topic and learn the fundamentals.
learningOutcome: In this six-part course we explore the anatomy and physiology underlying the vital signs so that you will develop a systematic, integrated understanding of how the body functions. Relevant body systems are reviewed including cardiovascular and respiratory, followed by explanations of how the function of these systems affects vital signs. We discuss normal ranges, normal variants, and the mechanisms that underlie changes in the objective measurement of vital signs. The course also includes demonstrations of appropriate techniques for measuring vital signs in yourself and others.

The course is designed for a broad, general audience but will be particularly interesting for individuals working in healthcare, those considering a career as a healthcare professional, lay caregivers, those with an interest in personal health and fitness, or anyone who simply wants to understand how the body functions.

title: Introductory Human Physiology
description: Discover the fascinating world of human physiology and learn about the body's organ systems, their functions, and how they maintain health.
lengthDescription: Gain insight into a topic and learn the fundamentals.
learningOutcome: Master key concepts in human physiology and homeostasis
Delve into the nervous, endocrine, cardiovascular, respiratory, and urinary systems
Examine the role of senses, muscles, gastrointestinal, and reproductive systems
Apply knowledge to real-life situations and medical conditions
(Bonus) Enhance your learning with a unique immersive virtual reality (VR) experience that takes you on an incredible journey inside the human body.

title: Introduction to Social Psychology
description: Learn the classic and contemporary social psychology , covering topics such as decision making, persuasion, and factors that promote health and well-being.
lengthDescription: Gain insight into a topic and learn the fundamentals.
learningOutcome: Explain key theories and concepts in social psychology and how they influence human behavior.
Analyze how social factors such as culture, group dynamics, and social norms shape decision making.
Identify the causes of prejudice, conflict, and persuasion and evaluate strategies to reduce bias and promote cooperation.
Apply social psychology research methods to real-world problems involving health, environment, and well-being.

title: Machine Learning
description: Build Intelligent Applications. Master machine learning fundamentals in four hands-on courses.
lengthDescription: Get in-depth knowledge of a subject.
learningOutcome: Explain core machine learning concepts including supervised and unsupervised learning techniques.
Apply prediction, classification, clustering, and information retrieval algorithms to real-world datasets.
Analyze large and complex datasets to extract meaningful patterns and insights.
Design machine learning systems that improve performance over time through iterative training.
Build intelligent applications capable of making data-driven predictions and decisions.
Implement machine learning workflows using Python and industry-standard libraries.

title: Astronomy: Exploring Time and Space
description: Learn more about modern astronomy and get up to date on the most recent astronomical discoveries without prior knowledge in science.
lengthDescription: Gain insight into a topic and learn the fundamentals.
learningOutcome: Describe fundamental concepts in modern astronomy, including celestial objects and cosmic phenomena.
Explain recent astronomical discoveries and their significance to our understanding of the universe.
Apply basic scientific methods to observe, analyze, and interpret astronomical data.
Use simulations and visualizations to explore astronomical systems and processes.
Recognize the historical development of astronomy from ancient civilizations to modern science.
Develop foundational knowledge in physics and chemistry as they relate to astronomical observations.

title: Financial Markets
description: Introduction to risk management and behavioral finance principles to understand the real-world functioning of securities, insurance, and banking industries.
lengthDescription: Gain insight into a topic and learn the fundamentals.
learningOutcome: Explain the core ideas, methods, and institutions that enable societies to manage financial risk and promote economic growth.
Analyze how risk management principles are applied across securities, insurance, and banking industries.
Apply concepts from behavioral finance to understand real-world financial decision making and market behavior.
Evaluate the role of financial institutions in fostering enterprise and supporting a well-functioning society.
Assess current financial practices and policies and analyze their implications for future economic stability.
Develop financially savvy leadership skills to manage business and enterprise-level risk effectively.
